metadata.dcterms:title: Supplementary data for 'Chapter 3: The impact of diagenetic processes on sediment-hosted massive sulfide ore distribution: Geochronological, stratigraphic, textural, and petrographic relationships between silica, barite and sulfides in the Anarraaq Zn-Pb-Ag deposit, Red Dog District, Alaska'
metadata.dcterms:creator: Reynolds, Merilie
metadata.dcterms:description:
Supplementary files associated with PhD thesis Chapter 3 - The impact of diagenetic processes on sediment-hosted massive sulfide ore distribution: Geochronological, stratigraphic, textural, and petrographic relationships between silica, barite and sulfides in the Anarraaq Zn-Pb-Ag deposit, Red Dog District, Alaska. This includes one figure and one data table.

Figure S3.1: Drill core sub-sampled for Re-Os isotopic analysis.

Table S3.1: Whole rock analyses of select subsamples of Anarraaq black shale analyzed for Re-Os.

These data are also included as Fig. A1 and Tab. A1 in a manuscript submitted to Economic Geology.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
metadata.dcterms:isReferencedBy: Reynolds, MA (2019) Sediment-hosted Zn-Pb-Ag mineralization in the Red Dog district, Alaska, USA: pre-ore environments and mineralizing processes. PhD Thesis, University of Alberta, Edmonton. https://doi.org/10.7939/r3-mmsk-9x89
